entry.title: 建站日志
entry.content:
·2016-8-27 :Hexo下建立个人博客，选择主题NEXT。
·2016-9-15 :新增了博客本地搜索，多说评论。
安装了gulp对本地HTML、CSS、JS等文件进行压缩，以加快访问速度:

间隔一段时间可以对图片进行压缩：

<script>
    (function () {
        var pos = '';
        if (pos == 1) {
            pos = '-title';
        } else if (pos == 3) {
            pos = '-more';
        } else {
            pos = '';
        }

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            var hdFirstImgObj = document.getElementById('hdFirstImgObj');
            var net;
            var start = speed.get('start');
            if (hdFirstImgObj) {
                var imgIsPreload = hdFirstImgObj.getAttribute('data-ispreload') === '1' ? true : false;
                var clicktime = hdFirstImgObj.getAttribute('data-clicktime') - 0;
                var isAla = hdFirstImgObj.getAttribute('data-isala') === '1' ? 'ala' : '';
                var frm = hdFirstImgObj.getAttribute('data-frm') || isAla;

                net = clicktime;
                var isPreLoaded = imgIsPreload ? 1 : 0;

                speed.mark('preloaded', isPreLoaded);
                speed.mark('frm', frm);
            } else {
                speed.mark('frm', '');
            }

            speed.set('app', 'searchdetail');
            
            if (!net) {
                if(window.performance){
                    net = window.performance.timing.navigationStart;
                }
            }

            net && speed.mark('net', start - net);
            speed.mark('domc');
            // 针对chrome细分数据
            if (window.performance && window.performance.timing) {
                var timing = window.performance.timing;
                // tcp connct时间
                speed.mark('dnst', timing.domainLookupEnd - timing.domainLookupStart);
                // dns解析时间
                speed.mark('cot', timing.connectEnd - timing.connectStart);
                // 首字节返回时间点
                speed.mark('rpnt', timing.responseStart);
                if (net) {
                    // tc跳板时间
                    speed.mark('tct', timing.navigationStart - net);
                    // 网络开始时间点
                    speed.mark('nets', net);
                }
                speed.mark('connectStart', timing.connectStart);
            }
        }, false);

        window.addEventListener('load', function () {

            speed.mark('load');
            LazySend();
        }, false);

        function LazySend() {
            //speed.mark('sid', bd.sessionid);
            // speed.mark('frm', '');
            speed.send();
        }
    })();
</script>

         * p = pv, 结果页PV统计：data=1，有结果；data=0无结果；data=-1，down页面
         **/

        return function(arg, url, e){
            var s = URL + json2Query(arg) + '&' + Math.random();
            request(s);
            if(url){
                setTimeout(function(){
                    location.href = url;
                }, 300);
                e = e || window.event;
                if(e){
                    if(e.preventDefault){
                        e.preventDefault();
                    }else{
                        e.returnValue = false;
                    }
                }

            }
        };

    window.__originTitle = document.title;
    function json2Query(json){
        if(json == null || typeof json != 'object') return json;
        var query = [];
        for(var i in json){
            if(i != '')
                query[query.length] = i + '=' + json[i];
        }
        return query.join('&');
    }

            document.title = window.__originTitle;
        }, 1000);

        window.useFlashUp = true;

    /**
     * 选择好文件通知flash上线
     */
    function notiUpload(){

        $.cookie('uploadTime', new Date().getTime(), {path: '/'});

        var logStr = "p=index&event_type=shitu.upload.click&pos=fileupload";

        }
        document.title = window.__originTitle;
        stInstance.showLoading();
    }
    /**
     * 整个上传是否成功
     */
    function returnState(boo,result){
        document.title = window.__originTitle;
        if(!boo){
            stInstance.hideLoading();
            alert("对不起，上传失败，请重新上传.");
            return false;
        }else if(boo){
            if (window.tn === 'index') {
                window.ss&&window.ss({type:'searchNum',p:'uploadSearch',form:'wantu',flash:'1'});
            } else if (window.tn === 'result') {
                window.ss&&window.ss({type:'searchNum',p:'uploadSearch',form:'searchresult',flash:'1'});
            } else if (window.tn === 'detail') {
                window.ss&&window.ss({type:'searchNum',p:'uploadSearch',form:'searchDetail',flash:'1'});
            }
            window.location.href=result;
        };
    }

    /*用户关闭flash文件选择框*/
    function filePickerEnd(){
        document.title = window.__originTitle;
    }
    window.returnState = returnState;
    window.flashInitCallback = flashInitCallback;
    window.notiUpload = notiUpload;
    window.filePickerEnd = filePickerEnd;

!function(){require.async(['common:widget/ui/base/base','searchdetail:widget/ui/statistic/statistic-core'], function ($, statistic) {

	    var titles = '';

			$adCard.find('#imContainer').find('h5 a').each(function(i, linkItem) {
		        titles += $(linkItem).text() + '*';
		    });
			statistic.send('5.1010000', {
			    tn: 'baiduimagedetail',
			    tag: 'card',
			    fm: 'ecim',
			    adText: encodeURIComponent(titles)
			});
		}

		$adCard.find('#imContainer').find('a').each(function(i, linkItem) {
			linkItem = $(linkItem);
			var linkUrl = linkItem.parents('.EC_im').find('a span').text();
			if(linkUrl) {
				var logExt = linkItem.attr('log-ext') || '';
				linkItem.attr('log-click', 'p=5.15&tag=card&fm=ecim'
										+ '&site=' + encodeURIComponent(linkUrl)
										+ '&adText=' + encodeURIComponent(linkItem.parents('.EC_im').find('h5 a').text())
										+ '&pos=' + (linkItem.attr('log-pos') || '')
										+ '&ext=' + encodeURIComponent(logExt));
			}
		});
	})
})

!function(){require.async(['common:widget/ui/base/base'], function($) {
    var userFrom = '';

    var elem = document.createElement('a');
    elem.href = document.referrer;
    var hostname = elem['hostname'];
    var urlfr = '';
    var chenjin = '';
    var urlword = '%E9%92%B1%E5%B8%81';

    if (hostname !== 'image.baidu.com') {
        if (urlfr) {
            userFrom += urlfr;
            if (chenjin === '1') {
                userFrom += 'chenjin1';
            } else if (chenjin === '0') {
                var wordList = ["%E7%BE%8E%E5%A5%B3%E5%9B%BE%E7%89%87",
                    "%E6%89%8B%E6%9C%BA%E5%A3%81%E7%BA%B8",
                    "%E6%89%8B%E6%9C%BA%E5%A3%81%E7%BA%B8%E5%9B%BE%E7%89%87",
                    "%E5%A4%B4%E5%83%8F",
                    "%E5%A4%B4%E5%83%8F%E5%9B%BE%E7%89%87"];
                if (wordList.indexOf(urlword) >= 0) {
                    userFrom += 'chenjin0';
                }
            }
        } else {
            userFrom = hostname;
        }
    } else {
        userFrom = $.cookie('userFrom') || '';
    }

    if (userFrom.length > 0) {
        var date = new Date();
        date.setTime(date.getTime() + (10 * 60 * 1000));
        $.cookie('userFrom', userFrom, {path: '/', expires: date, domain: '.baidu.com'});
    } else {
        $.cookie('userFrom', null, {path: '/', domain: '.baidu.com'});
    }
});
}();
